# TabletopInteraction.AllowedDestinations

**Enumeration**

The possible destinations of equipment in an interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
enum AllowedDestinations
```

## Destinations

- **TabletopInteraction.AllowedDestinations.any**: Any equipment is allowed to be the proposed destination
- **TabletopInteraction.AllowedDestinations.restricted(_:)**: Restricts the proposed destination to the given identifiers

## Managing the interaction destination

- **setConfiguration(_:)**: Sets the configuration of this interaction.
- **TabletopInteraction.Configuration**
- **TabletopInteraction.Destination**: An object that represents the destination position and orientation of equipment in an interaction.
- **setAllowedDestinations(_:)**: Sets which equipment the interaction can target.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
